title: Spiced pulled pork with sage and onion stuffing and barbecue sauce
description: This barbecue-flavoured pulled pork just needs time in the oven; the side dishes can be thrown together in minutes.
ingredients: 1 small onion, peeled, very finely chopped
1½ tsp hickory ‘liquid smoke’ (available from online retailers)
freshly ground black pepper, to taste
6 apples, cores removed, apples left whole, skin scored around the middle
1 heaped tbsp chopped fresh flatleaf parsley
salt and freshly ground black pepper
2 garlic cloves, crushed to a paste with the edge of a knife
salt and freshly ground black pepper
8 white bread rolls, cut in half, to serve
